about_the_game: The soundtrack for Asurya's Embers was composed and performed by student musicians at SMU's Meadows School of the Arts. Theodore Morris was the lead composer, with additional music compositions by Nha-Y Duong, Matthew Foss, and Anika Saiprabhu. The solo sarangi performance was by Deepak Paramashivan  and the solo soprano performance was by Jasmine Williams. The remaining instrumental performers were Duncan McVety (Violin), Brandon Morrison (Violin), Matt Velasquez (Violin), Spencer Byrd (Viola), Nha-Y Duong (Viola), Jackson Benjamin (Cello), Katelyn Petersen (Cello), Israel MacDonald (Double Bass), Kristen Edwards (Flute), Kendra Hamblin (Flute), Jackson Thomas War (French Horn), Melody Tang (Percussion), and Max Wittaker (Percussion).
detailed_description: The soundtrack for Asurya's Embers was composed and performed by student musicians at SMU's Meadows School of the Arts. Theodore Morris was the lead composer, with additional music compositions by Nha-Y Duong, Matthew Foss, and Anika Saiprabhu. The solo sarangi performance was by Deepak Paramashivan  and the solo soprano performance was by Jasmine Williams. The remaining instrumental performers were Duncan McVety (Violin), Brandon Morrison (Violin), Matt Velasquez (Violin), Spencer Byrd (Viola), Nha-Y Duong (Viola), Jackson Benjamin (Cello), Katelyn Petersen (Cello), Israel MacDonald (Double Bass), Kristen Edwards (Flute), Kendra Hamblin (Flute), Jackson Thomas War (French Horn), Melody Tang (Percussion), and Max Wittaker (Percussion).

name: Asurya's Embers Soundtrack
short_description: Transport to a mythical setting in the Himalayas through the beautiful soundtrack of Asurya's Embers. Navigate through the challenges, toils, and triumphs of Dawa's journey as she seeks to restore natural balance to her beloved home.
